HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: E patilwe, e sireleditswe ebile e sireleditswe ke Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Re netefatsa tshepo e matla ya tshebediso ya tshedimosetso ya gago. Datha yohle e patilwe ka lehlakoreng la moreki. Ha re tsebe aterese ya gago, se o abelana ka sona, le bao o abelanang le bona - le se kgethegileng, dikahare.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: O feela o itseng sehokelo sa tshedimosetso se o se thehileng le bao o abelanang le bona. Ha o theha sephiri, o ka eketsa password pele se ka bula. Hape ho kgethegile ho beha nako ya burner. Le fa ho ntse jalo, sephiri se tla tloswa ka mor'a matsatsi a 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_TITLE: E patilwe go tswa qetellong go ya qetellong
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Link yohle le dikahare di hashewa ka lehlakoreng la moreki, ho bolelang hore le rona re sitwa go tseba sehokelo le dikahare. Sekhetho se seng le se seng se na le ID e kgethegileng e telele e leng 36 e leng encryption e e lekgolo go nna le tshebediso ya Secreta Message le dikahare tse di patilweng ka AES-256.
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Ngwaga le romela molaetsa, e tla
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: E patilwe, e sireleditswe ebile e sireleditswe ke Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Ngwaga molaetsa wa gago wa Secreta, password kapa tshedimosetso e amanang *
HOME.SHARE_EMPTY: Tlohela e sa na le lefa.
HOME.CREATED_TITLE_SHARE: Kopitsa link kapa abelana ka yona.
